alert.note: Alert for Big Island Interior; Big Island South; Big Island Southeast (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 09 at 2:01PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...GUSTY SHOWERS WILL IMPACT HAWAII IN HAWAII COUNTY THROUGH 230 PM HST... At 159 PM HST, Doppler radar was tracking a line of heavy showers with gusty winds over Naalehu moving northeast at 40 mph. This feature will move toward Pahala and Wood Valley through 230 PM. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Naalehu, Pahala, Wood Valley, Kawa Flats, Punaluu Beach, Hawaii Volcanoes National Park, Discovery Harbour, and Waiohinu. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Big Island Interior; Big Island South; Big Island Southeast
